attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
12/08/07

Things can get worse! I strongly feel that British troops should come out of Iraq and Afghanistan?

As a new incumbent, Mr Brown, it is time to ASK and listen to the British public about the above issue.

We are not helping the situation and we are losing good young people. To keep faith with your promise when you took the job: Ask now before too many more are lost or scared for life.

The nationals of Iraq and Afghanistan to not want us in their countries.

This is the most fundemental issue of 'faith' in your Government, as far as I am concerned.

Blair never listened!

Alan Jones

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
